short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Right-click context menu to add payments test data

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Helps to test common payment frameworks with testing data, such as:
- Name, Address, Phone per location.
- Payment test data for providers: 
    1. Stripe
    2. PayPal
    3. Spreedly
    4. BrainTree
    5. MercadoPago
    6. Mango
    7. WorldPay
    8. Adyen
    9. SagePay
    10. Paymill
    11. More are coming!
- Open source and open for modification (https://github.com/facundofarias/test-payments)
- You can also propose new features on GitHub! :)
